mapper.select: SELECT article_id,article_content,`options`,user_name,user_type,user_img,college_name,article_message.create_time FROM article_message LEFT JOIN `user` ON article_message.user_id = `user`.id LEFT JOIN college ON article_message.college_id = college.id where article_message.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT like_id, a.user_id AS like_user, a.article_id, a.createTime AS lcreate, article_content, b.user_id AS article_user_id, b.college_id, b.create_time AS acreate, user_name, user_type, user_img FROM `like` AS a LEFT JOIN article_message AS b ON a.article_id = b.article_id LEFT JOIN `user` AS c ON b.user_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY lcreate ASC
